description: Try our easy to follow Quinoa & Chicken Risotto recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Quinoa & Chicken Risotto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 tbs of the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. Add leek and cook for 3 minutes until soft. Add the mushrooms, garlic and thyme. Cook for 3 minutes until mushrooms are golden.

Rinse quinoa under running water and add to vegetables in pan. Stir well to combine. Add the wine to the quinoa mixture and cook, stirring, until the liquid is absorbed. Add the chicken stock and cook, stirring occasionally, for 20 minutes or until tender.

Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a nonstick frying pan. Season the chicken with salt and pepper. Add to pan and cook over medium high heat for 4 to 5 minutes on each side or until chicken is golden and cooked through. Slice chicken. Divide risotto among serving bowls. Top with chicken. Serve.
